mapper.insert: insert into farmdiary_manage (fdm_mb_num, fdm_type, fdm1_ad_num, fdm1_detail_address, fdm1_lot_area, fdm1_actual_area, fdm1_idle_area, fdm1_soil_check) values(#{fdm_mb_num},#{fdm_type},#{fdm1_ad_num},#{fdm1_detail_address},#{fdm1_lot_area},#{fdm1_actual_area},#{fdm1_idle_area},#{fdm1_soil_check})
insert into farmdiary_manage (fdm_mb_num, fdm_type, fdm7_date, fdm7_pest_pic) values(#{mb_id},"7",now(),#{mb_type})
mapper.select: select Address.*, farmdiary_manage.* from Address INNER JOIN farmdiary_manage ON Address.ad_num = farmdiary_manage.fdm1_ad_num where fdm_mb_num=#{mb_num};
